item.description:
RELEASE INFO: * ulimit bypass for collection export on OSX * Update dependencies * Update German translation (by Bhaeron) * Update Chinese translation (by SANagisa) * Treat buildings, technology, diplo actions and gov authorities in the same manner as pop_jobs, districts (for Stellaris) * Fix messagebox window height size
CHANGES FROM v1.15: * Updated dependencies * Small fixes * Add option to override appSettings via appSettings.override.json
